plot: The story of a racing car driver who undergoes so many transplants that it can no longer be determined which people have contributed to his make-up.
title: Przekladaniec
plot_es: The story of a racing car driver who undergoes so many transplants that it can no longer be determined which people have contributed to his make-up.
plot_en: The story of a racing car driver who undergoes so many transplants that it can no longer be determined which people have contributed to his make-up.
